bibl.title: The Chronology and Economic Condition of Late Roman Karanis: An Archaeological Reassessment.

series.title: Journal of the American Research Center in Egypt
JARCE

bibl.note: Reconsiders the contention that the site of Karanis, excavated by the University of Michigan, was in severe economic decline in the IVth century C.E. and abandoned in the early Vth century C.E. By examining pottery excavated from the site, it is possible to find positive evidence that Karanis was occupied at least until the early VIth century C.E.
